name: victoriametrics
description: VictoriaMetrics is a fast, cost-effective time series database and monitoring solution. It can act as Prometheus-compatible storage, supports clustering, and exposes a web UI and HTTP APIs for queries and metrics.
features: Prometheus compatible: Drop-in replacement for Prometheus with full PromQL query support.
High performance: Ingest millions of data points per second with low resource usage.
Cost-effective storage: Store metrics efficiently with up to 10x compression compared to Prometheus.
Clustering: Scale horizontally with built-in clustering for high availability and capacity.
Long-term storage: Retain metrics for years with efficient storage and fast queries.
PromQL queries: Query metrics using familiar PromQL syntax with extensions for advanced use cases.
Grafana integration: Visualize metrics in Grafana using VictoriaMetrics as a data source.
Remote write: Accept metrics from Prometheus and other systems via remote write protocol.
Web UI: Explore metrics and run queries through the built-in web interface.
Downsampling: Automatically downsample old data to reduce storage while preserving trends.
Multi-tenancy: Isolate metrics for different teams or applications with built-in multi-tenancy.
Backup and restore: Back up time series data and restore for disaster recovery.
